response.overview: Jidan felt uneasy about the arrival of Wak Saleh, who wanted to visit during the Covid-19 pandemic. His discomfort wasn’t without reason—Wak Saleh was suffering from the flu, an illness everyone was trying to avoid during that time. Jidan ended up calling his parents, who were not at home. He then performed a Malay ritual suggested by his mother to drive the guest away.
response.title: Tulah Tungku
